metadata.title: End of life cycle for Adobe Acrobat 7
metadata.description: Product Adobe Acrobat 7 not longer supported

metadata.title: Adobe Acrobat 7 Series is installed
metadata.description: Adobe Acrobat 7 Series is installed

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:6213 - Modified inventory definition CPE IDs to match the CPE IDs found in the official CPE dictionary

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:ste:5564 - Updated criterion comments to align with test comments, corrected version numbers in test comments, changed numerous occurrences of 'Reader' to 'Acrobat', added '$' to the end of regular expressions, removed duplicate variables and objects, and removed trailing '\' from paths.

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:def:6213 - Updates to Adobe Acrobat and Reader on Windows to return false rather than error on several checks. New Inventory and Vulnerability Definitions for Reader and Acrobat.

metadata.title: Microsoft Office 2003 end of support
metadata.description: Microsoft Office 2003 is not supported. It should be upgraded to a newer version of Office to get continuing support and updates.

metadata.title: Microsoft Office 2003 is installed
metadata.description: The application Microsoft Office 2003 is installed.

modified.comment: Added CPE reference.
Corrected ste:449 to use a pattern match and allow a major version of 11 and not check for other version components. Implemented by Jon Baker of the MITRE Corporation.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:ste:449 - Made updates to MS09-073 - In ste:5428 corrected the version and updated comments to test ID tst:10574 & authoring guide updates.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:418 - Corrected registry key
Added Windows Server 2008 R2 platform
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:418 - Updated registry object and corresponding state collected while checking if Microsoft Office 2003 is installed.

metadata.title: Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Service Pack 1 x86 should be installed (KB2674319)
metadata.description: Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Service Pack 1 x86 should be installed.

criterion.comment: Check if HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\$Instance Names\Setup!Version (32-bit) is less than 11.1.3000.0

metadata.title: Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Service Pack 1 x64 should be installed (KB2674319)
metadata.description: Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Service Pack 1 x64 should be installed.

criterion.comment: a version of Windows for the x64 architecture is installed
Check if HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\$Instance Names\Setup!Version is less than 11.1.3000.0

metadata.title: Microsoft SQL Server 2012 is installed
metadata.description: Microsoft SQL Server 2012 is installed.

modified.comment: EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:11792 - SQL Server 32-bit & 64-bit issues.
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:26798 - "MSSQL" added to object regex to narrow search
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:26674 - Added criteria for 64 bit
EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:26798 - Fixed/New Inventory Definitions, and fixed Vulnerability Definitions for Microsoft SQL Server 2012 and 2014.

EDITED oval:org.mitre.oval:obj:26674 - Modified tests which check SQL Server 2005 Service Packs. The specific version of SQL Server was checked instead of diapason. Now new states were added which mark high limit of SP and operation="greater than or equal" was add to the old states

criterion.comment: SQL Server instances with version greater than 11.0.0.0 and less than 12.0.0.0 exist

Check if HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Microsoft SQL Server\$Instance Names\Setup!Version is less than 11.1.3000.0
a version of Windows for the x64 architecture is installed

The registry key matches with Apache HTTP Server 1.3
Regex that matches a string containing numbers separated by a hyphen
Regex that matches a string containing -OEM-
